reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Assisting Myanmar in implementing the Paris Agreement on climate change by turning its Intended Nationally Determined Contribution commitment into action

description.narrative: The project is designed to draw on UK expertise to develop transparent, measurable and action-orientated implementation plans to deliver the targets and activities identified in the Nationally Determined Contributions of Myanmar. This will increase private sector involvement, in particular in the low carbon energy sector, by identifying specific investment opportunities for investors and technology providers.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
